items.content:

Thank you.

Detailed Description
Reason for request: Please briefly describe the help needed for this account.
items.content:
To have TikTok integrated with Samsung CRM to utilise 1P audiences.

We have a feedback from the previous POC on this support as below: Hi Yogesh, thanks and hope you are well too! I'm unfortunately no longer working with Samsung account. Looking at the email content, raising an Athena ticket with TPS should help them solve the issue.
